page.title: 12Penny's Days 1
page.content:
Friday 12 July 1985
Got up at 7o'clock a.m. Got dressed, put on vest, knickers, socks, underskirt, blue tee-shirt and a blue dress. Half past seven breakfast-cornflakes, cup of tea and a slice of toast. Eight o'clock-get washed, brush teeth, comb hair and get shoes on. Quarter past eight-play with Tarah(younger sister) Twenty past eight-get toys to take to school Twenty-five past eight-my two friends Sharon Greer and Kerry Wilson come for me. Half past eight-go to school. We sometimes go for Sarah Findlay. (School is from 8-50 a.m. to 3-15 p.m. and we have spelling test,English, maths,geography,story and quiz.)
